page.title: 01NORTHAMPTON NORTHERN AREA
page.content: THE AREA SURVEYED IS A WEDGE SHAPE RUNNING FROM JUST OUTSIDE THE TOWN CENTRE NORTHWARDS, THROUGH THE VICTORIAN INNER SUBURB OF SEMILONG, OVER THE FAIRLY INDUSTRIAL POCKET OF KINGSTHORPE HOLLOW, UP THE HILL TO THE LARGE PRE 1914 HOUSES, NOW MAINLY DENTISTS SURGERIES, AT QUEENS PARK. WE THEN COME TO THE OLD VILLAGE OF KINGSTHORPE TO THE WEST AND THE ST. DAVIDS COUNCIL ESTATE TO THE EAST. FURTHER NORTH STILL WE ARRIVE IN THE MODERN OPEN-PLAN HOUSING ESTATES WHICH MARK THE EDGE OF THE TOWN.
